```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(lubridate)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(png)
library(grid)
library(rgdal)
library(raster)
library(sp)
library(spdep)
```

```{r}
report<-read.csv("mc1-reports-data.csv")
```


```{r}
shake <- report %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~time, y = ~shake_intensity) %>%
  add_lines(alpha = 0.4) 
shake
```

```{r}
power <- report %>%
  plot_ly(x = ~time, y = ~power) %>%
  add_lines(alpha = 0.4) 
power
```
